client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: The Client ID of your developer application

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: The client secret of your developer application

refresh_token.title: Refresh Token
refresh_token.description: A refresh token generated using the above client ID and secret

realm_id.title: Realm ID
realm_id.description: The Realm ID of the QuickBooks company you want to access

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The start date of the report, in the format YYYY-MM-DD. start_date must be less than end_date.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The end date of the report, in the format YYYY-MM-DD. start_date must be less than end_date.
